name: Flying Muscle Car simulator
description:
Flying Muscle Car simulator

Welcome to biggest open world Flying Car Simulator. In this crazy game you will be flying with an amulance. this might seem strange,
but this game is really a lot of fun and challenge. Everything including physics are created to be as realistic as a real flying car as possible.

his game is perfect for you! You can test your airplane pilot skills and car driving ability at the same time. Fly your plane around the
world discover new landscapes, Drive your Muscle car do stunts and drifts !

FLYING CAR FREE

Game features:

=> Stunning HD Graphics
=> Realistic and dynamic auto physics
=> Advanced airplane flight physics
=> Easy and Free to use
=> No WiFi? No Problem.
=> Offline Play
